CustomField.formula: if( ISPICKVAL( Sharing_Restriction__c , "Educational Use Only - Do Not Mention Customer Name") , IMAGE("/resource/CSForce_Edu", "Educational Use Only - Do Not Mention Customer Name"), IMAGE("/resource/CSForce_ExtUse", "Approved for External Use - OK to Mention Customer Name"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This image is set by the "Share Restrictions" picklist.
CustomField.label: Able to Mention Customer Name?
